panels.visual: Malrik attempting another Displacement lens Perfect success! **Caption:** "DC 15 SLEIGHT OF HAND - 19+8=27!" **Sound EFFECTS:** "CLICK-HUMMM"
Displacement lens fully aligned Barrier around Alric failing completely **Sound EFFECTS:** "SHATTER!"
Lunara attempting Nature lens Success! **Caption:** "DC 15 NATURE - SUCCESS!"
Lunara calming the angry mephits Speaking to them with druidic power
panels.dialogue: Lunara: "Peace! You are not enemies! You are essence made manifest! Return to balance!"
